name: Fashion Business
summary:
This Game is about Monica.

Monica is a "Rich B*tch". Monica is the Boss.
Most of all Monica adores authority and to control people and she manages with everything not in a sensitive or delicate way.

If Monica was your Boss, you would be likely fired.
For certain, everybody has ever met their own Monica! Take part in her luxurious life. 

Monica is sure that her existence is going to be always the same! What do you think?
If suddenly you appear as witness of her falling down lower and lower in the social standing?​
info:
• 中文名: 潮流贵圈
  • 别名: 时装界
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 游戏制作: DecentMonkey
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2018-06-02
